Data Fields
vpsissIsifCtrl Struct Reference

Resizer control structure, passed as an argument to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_CTRL. More...

#include <vps_cfgisif.h>

Data Fields

vpsissIsifModule_t module
 
vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig_t * wbCfg
 
vpsissIsifVfdcConfig_t * vfdcCfg
 
vpsissIsifBlackClampConfig_t * blkClampCfg
 
vpsissIsif2DLscConfig_t * lscCfg
 

Detailed Description

Resizer control structure, passed as an argument to VPS_ISS_IPIPE_IOCTL_CTRL.

Field Documentation

vpsissIsifBlackClampConfig_t* vpsissIsifCtrl::blkClampCfg

Pointer to Black Clamping configuration. Should not be NULL when module is set to VPS_ISS_ISIF_MODULE_BLACK_CLAMP

vpsissIsif2DLscConfig_t* vpsissIsifCtrl::lscCfg

Pointer to 2D Lens Shading Configuration Should not be NULL when module is set to VPS_ISS_ISIF_MODULE_2D_LSC

vpsissIsifModule_t vpsissIsifCtrl::module

Id of the module to be configured, could be either Input, ResizerA or ResizerB Appropriate structure pointer need to be assigned when one of these modules is selected here

vpsissIsifVfdcConfig_t* vpsissIsifCtrl::vfdcCfg

Pointer to vertical defect pixel correction configuration. Should not be NULL when module is set to VPS_ISS_ISIF_MODULE_VDFC

vpsissIsifGainOfstConfig_t* vpsissIsifCtrl::wbCfg

Pointer to structure containing Gains and Offsets for all three outputs from ISIF, should not be null when module is set to VPS_ISS_ISIF_MODULE_WB
